document_title: Postpartum infection: Causes, symptoms and consequences
subsection_content:
Some signs and symptoms of the disease include:
Lower abdominal pain, mild fever or foul-smelling lochia (signs of endometritis);; Pain, stiffness, heat, redness in one or both breasts accompanied by fever, chills, muscle pain, fatigue or headache (signs of mastitis);; Red skin, discharge, swelling, heat, tenderness or pain around the incision, wound (whether it is a cesarean section, episiotomy or tear), incision showing signs of opening;; Difficulty urinating, painful urination, feeling like you have to urinate frequently and urgently but passing little or no urine, foamy or bloody urine (signs of urinary tract infection);
subsection_title: nhiem trung hau san.json. Symptoms of postpartum infection
